documents.document: Devastated about Many Clouds! A gem of a horse.....
Why did Long not that?? Perfect for a dipping half volley! What a fem!
Yoshida to score anytime! Not even my worst bet of the day!
@paulski1978 very poor week! Luckily I was playing the bottom team.
Hazard as captain! Epic failure
Un-Abel to play football!
@tomstyleo @rharragan Sanchez as captain aswell to the top it of?
Waiting on Giroud to score anytime and he does nothing productive all game! Typical......
50/1 RAB! Excellent work
@gazalaar @Oddschanger I had £10 on it! Brilliant end to a poor betting day!
@rharragan @ShazF21 one 9/1 winner and a lot of ffs! Cracking day though
Wouldn't back it because it was 10/3! Drifts to 7/1! So frustrating...
@tomstyleo @rharragan worked out even better as he was 4/1 to then score a double #slickclub
@tomstyleo @rharragan well that was frustrating! https://t.co/HkQkAuE71W
OK so last 4 jumps selection have fallen!!
I wouldn't want Danny Rose to back me up in a fight after that!!
Wins at 3/1 and I backed it at 9s! Well done Flaming Spear and Robert Winston!
I can't believe the last 3 horse I've backed over the jumps have all fell!!
I'll be gutted if only Carlisle not scoring again let's me down! https://t.co/9huW2TxCw3
3 goals away from around 8 plus grand! Northampton hopeless, Everton to score 2 plus, I'll blame myself putting Cowdenbeath bts!
When you need a jockey to pull you out of trouble! I'd always choose Colin Keane!! Gent
@rharragan 36/1! Pity Palace are dire! Fraser was 5/1 alone anytime.
Fraser, Crouch and Benteke anytime scorer acca and Teke dragged off at halftime! :/
Why did I take Harry Kane out my team! It has been a shocker! Such a bad game week!
The dab is the dumpest thing ever!
Didn't change my fantasy football team in team and it was looking slick.... That's going to hurt!
@gary_priestley my cliff horse!! Pretty much all I need to say....
Ah my good old cliff horse Buywise rattling home for 3rd is what I expected to hear later today!!
Well that's the last time I'll back Cogry! Jeezo!
Beat in a photo! How often can I hit the bar!!
Somehow need to find Sanchez into my team!!
4/5 anytime goalscores! One away again!
@rharragan @tomstyleo ah Ramos! I did look at him when he was 6/1 but left it...true story
@rharragan @tomstyleo narrow it down? All bets are my favourite
9/1 the field! Good luck......
2/3 anytime goalscorer! I've hit the bar alot this week!
@tomstyleo it definitely needed a change. Channel 4 racing was getting boring and the less said about The Morning Line the better!
Very excited! https://t.co/UdZbp3uzii
I'm thinking it's goodbye Lukaku and hello Harry Kane!! #FantasyFootball
@FPL_Fly he is sitting on my bench! Another poor week!
@JakeJohns always back Davy Russell at huge prices ew!
50/1 3rd! Not a da start to the day, I did only have about 5p ew on it! Meh!
A Rochdale goal away from a 244/1 coupon!
Ah when your selection decides to put itself in reverse! I'm sure I could run faster.... :/
How has Pedro not scored today!
Sell Mata and put Clyne on the bench!...red arrows coming my way
Worst fantasy football week ever!
Took Mata and Ozil out my team! No doubt they'll both score
@SkyBet 508 appearances #SkyBetClub
Aerial drifts to 12s! Brilliant
@JakeJohns Buywise's run was identical to last years! My favourite horse and the most frustrating! My cliff horse, we've all got one!!
Buywise rattling home again!!! This bloody horse!!
Another loser at Cheltenham! My favourite new phrase!! Hopefully tomorrow is better.....
Seeing Spin Doctor win after deciding against backing it, soul-destroying!!
Decided on Ozil instead of Hazard! What a poor poor choice!
Really need a QPR and a Benteke goal!
How were Reading as big as 2/1! What a great price..
@tomstyleo @rharragan just bet on the breeders cup! Gent or dry lunch... We'll soon see
@rharragan @tomstyleo I've completed it mate - #bantz
@rharragan you should maybe pay attention to fantasy football and not my Scotrail rants #tunamelt
Another Scotrail service another out of order toilet @ScotRail! I can see my my £2700 season ticket is well spent!!… https://t.co/kPw4uO24aG
How do I fit KDB, Sanchez, Hazard, Augero, Lukaku, Costa, Coutinho and Firmino into the same team? the joys of being a FFM #FantasyFootball
Dembele couldn't score against them are home to cost me a coupon, but away from home he bangs one in! Football betting eh!
When you wake up to find out it routed the field in the Melbourne Cup and still finished 2nd! Cracking run from Heartbreak City!
What a goal that would have been!
Bloody Cardiff! Always one team!
Hopefully Augero finds form today!
I might be the only one without Sanchez in my team! Yikes! #FantasyFootball
@FPLadvice swapped him for Mata, hopefully it pays of!
Going into a gameweek without an Arsenal attacker! The stress of fantasy football! Hopefully a Moyes masterclass!!
Dogma beat by a neck!! Gutting...
Since I backed Wyfield Rose and was miles back, she has went on to win 4/5 races! Very frustrating....
Matt Ritchie, the Ozil of the Championship! Loves an assist!
@BenLinfoot Spin Doctor was your tip of the day LTO, glad I followed again and got 20s!
Time to invest in Chelsea players in my fantasy football team!
A missed penalty and a yellow card..I'm running out of patience with Sergio after his last few performance!
My last tweet!! That was well timed!
That was a brilliantly taken goal! Awful defending again though, anyone still with a Man City defender in their fantasy football team..yikes
Hopefully this is the day Matt Ritchie becomes Sir Matt Ritchie or at least a gent! #newcastlevipswich #boysdayout

With a name like Jesse, you'd be better settling down!
What a miss!! The whole goal to aim at and you fire it wide!
A few after work drinks #WorldSmileDay https://t.co/SbDviBVZYo
@BurgerKingUK 10 mins queueing for an Oero shake, get to the register and they have no milkshake! A waste of my day..
@BurgerKingUK don't you think your shops should display big signs informing the customer before they queue if the are out of something??..
@ScotRail is the 19.22 Edinburgh to Helensburgh Central running on time??
Udinese and City not scoring lets a 95/1 coupon down! Getting closer
Fantasy football this season - nailed it!!! (so far)...
Udinese! Absolutely hopeless! All you had to do was score once! One goal.. :/
27 minutes in and I've only realised Coutinho is playing! Yikes!!
@ScotRail @ShazF21 so I had to pay out for a weekly ticket while this is resolved
@ScotRail @ShazF21 this has caused a lot of problems to myself as my company wrote a cheque to Scotrail and this was rejected...

@ScotRail can you tell me the cheque payee if buying a season ticket by cheque at booking office? Thanks
Just a Matt Ritchie goal away from a 70/1 anytime goal scorer acca! Always another day....
How did this team ever beat Man utd? They have been woeful!! I feel bad for them...
Ross Barkley is absolutely dire at the moment!
